componentDescription: A tooltip component that displays supplementary information on hover or focus for any element.

content.description: Defines the content to be displayed inside the tooltip when it is open.

children.description: The element that triggers the tooltip to appear or disappear.

position.description: Specifies the preferred position of the tooltip relative to its trigger, e.g., 'top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right'.

align.description: Sets the alignment of the tooltip content along its primary axis, such as 'start', 'center', or 'end'.

size.description: Determines the visual size of the tooltip component, e.g., 'small', 'medium', 'large'.

variant.description: Applies a specific visual style or variant to the tooltip, such as 'default' or 'error'.

openDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the tooltip appears after the trigger interaction (e.g., hover, focus) begins.

closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the tooltip hides after the trigger interaction ends.

showArrow.description: A boolean indicating whether an arrow pointing to the trigger should be displayed on the tooltip content.

isDisabled.description: If true, prevents the tooltip from being opened or interacted with.

views.description: Allows custom styling to be applied to different parts of the tooltip component based on its internal structure.
